input: Coordinate a patient's procedure by checking OR availability, resolving scheduling conflicts, updating the medical record and billing system, and confirming the final appointment.

inputs.name: O
inputs.input_data: Available time slots, room capacities, equipment availability

inputs.name: P
inputs.bound_reference: Requires explicit user provision or linkage.

inputs.name: P
inputs.source_origin: OR Schedule Data (Input 1), Patient Availability Preferences (Input 4)

inputs.name: B
inputs.input_data: CPT/ICD-10 code mapped to procedure type

steps:
Uses: OR Schedule Data (Input 1)  
Action: Query OR Scheduling API for available time slots matching procedure requirements  
Produces: Available OR Time Slots  
Stores/Sends To: Temporary memory

Uses: Patient Medical History (Input 2)  
Action: Retrieve patient contraindications and procedure requirements from EHR  
Produces: Patient Eligibility Profile  
Stores/Sends To: Temporary memory

Uses: Physician Schedule (Input 3), Patient Availability Preferences (Input 4)  
Action: Cross-reference physician availability with patient preferences to identify conflict-free windows  
Produces: Valid Scheduling Window List  
Stores/Sends To: Temporary memory

Uses: Valid Scheduling Window List (Step 3 output), Available OR Time Slots (Step 1 output)  
Action: Resolve conflicts by selecting first mutually available OR/patient/physician time slot  
Produces: Final Procedure Date/Time/Room (Input 6)  
Stores/Sends To: Input 6

Uses: Procedure Type (Input 5), Final Procedure Date/Time/Room (Input 6)  
Action: Update OR Scheduling System with confirmed procedure details  
Produces: OR Schedule Update Confirmation  
Stores/Sends To: OR Scheduling API

Uses: Final Procedure Date/Time/Room (Input 6), Patient Medical History (Input 2)  
Action: Append procedure log to EHR with date, type, and room details  
Produces: EHR Update Confirmation  
Stores/Sends To: EHR System API

Uses: Billing Code (Input 7)  
Action: Create charge record in billing system using derived billing code  
Produces: Billing System Update Confirmation  
Stores/Sends To: Billing System API

Uses: Patient Contact Information (Input 8), Final Procedure Date/Time/Room (Input 6)  
Action: Generate and send confirmation message via SMS/email  
Produces: Appointment Confirmation Delivery Receipt  
Stores/Sends To: Communication system log  

[DEPTH STOP CONDITIONS MET: All DERIVABLE inputs (5,6,7) decomposed into SYSTEM-RETRIEVABLE (1,2,3,8) or USER-CONTROLLED (4) sources]
execution_plan.raw_response:
Inputs:  
1. OR Schedule Data  
   Source Type: SYSTEM-RETRIEVABLE  
   Source Origin: Hospital OR Scheduling API  
   Input Data: Available time slots, room capacities, equipment availability  
   Bound Reference: N/A  

2. Patient Medical History  
   Source Type: SYSTEM-RETRIEVABLE  
   Source Origin: Electronic Health Record (EHR) System API  
   Input Data: Patient ID, procedure requirements, contraindications  
   Bound Reference: N/A  

3. Physician Schedule  
   Source Type: SYSTEM-RETRIEVABLE  
   Source Origin: Physician Scheduling System API  
   Input Data: Physician availability, blocked times  
   Bound Reference: N/A  

4. Patient Availability Preferences  
   Source Type: USER-CONTROLLED  
   Source Origin: Patient  
   Input Data: Preferred dates/times, contact preferences  
   Bound Reference: Requires explicit user provision or linkage.  

5. Procedure Type  
   Source Type: DERIVABLE  
   Source Origin: Patient Medical History (Input 2)  
   Input Data: Physician-ordered procedure code  
   Bound Reference: Derived from Input 2  

6. Procedure Date/Time/Room  
   Source Type: DERIVABLE  
   Source Origin: OR Schedule Data (Input 1), Patient Availability Preferences (Input 4)  
   Input Data: Resolved time slot, room assignment  
   Bound Reference: Derived from Inputs 1 and 4  

7. Billing Code  
   Source Type: DERIVABLE  
   Source Origin: Procedure Type (Input 5)  
   Input Data: CPT/ICD-10 code mapped to procedure type  
   Bound Reference: Derived from Input 5  

8. Patient Contact Information  
   Source Type: SYSTEM-RETRIEVABLE  
   Source Origin: EHR System API (Input 2)  
   Input Data: Phone number, email address  
   Bound Reference: N/A  

Outputs:  
1. Updated OR Schedule  
   Type: Persisted state change in OR system  
2. Updated Medical Record  
   Type: Persisted procedure log in EHR  
3. Updated Billing System Entry  
   Type: Charge record in billing system  
4. Appointment Confirmation Message  
   Type: SMS/email sent to patient  

Steps:  
Step 1:  
Uses: OR Schedule Data (Input 1)  
Action: Query OR Scheduling API for available time slots matching procedure requirements  
Produces: Available OR Time Slots

Step 4:

Step 5:

Step 7:

Step 8:
